guide/essentials/typescript-setup.title: TypeScript Configuration Guide
guide/essentials/typescript-setup.description: This guide details how to correctly configure TypeScript in your project to use WSXJS.

guide/essentials/getting-started.title: Getting Started
guide/essentials/getting-started.description: Get started with WSXJS in 5 minutes, from installation to creating your first component

guide/core-concepts/wsx-design.title: WSXJS Design Documentation
guide/core-concepts/wsx-design.description: WSXJS framework design documentation, including project structure, core APIs and mechanisms

guide/core-concepts/web-components.title: WebComponent Guide
guide/core-concepts/web-components.description: WebComponent is the standard custom element base class provided by WSXJS, using Shadow DOM to provide complete style isolation and encapsulation

guide/core-concepts/light-components.title: LightComponent Usage Guide
guide/core-concepts/light-components.description: LightComponent is a lightweight custom element base class provided by WSXJS, designed for scenarios that require integration with third-party libraries or use Light DOM

guide/core-concepts/jsx-support.title: WSXJS JSX Support Documentation
guide/core-concepts/jsx-support.description: WSXJS provides complete JSX support without relying on React or other frameworks. Through framework-level configuration, any project using WSX can get out-of-the-box JSX experience.

guide/core-concepts/design-philosophy.title: WSXJS Design Philosophy
guide/core-concepts/design-philosophy.description: WSXJS is a native-first Web Components framework dedicated to providing the closest experience to native Web development

guide/advanced/typescript-wsx-types.title: WSX Type System Guide
guide/advanced/typescript-wsx-types.description: This guide details how the `.wsx` file type system works in WSXJS, maintenance methods, and best practices.

guide/advanced/publishing.title: WSXJS Publishing Guide
guide/advanced/publishing.description: This guide explains how to publish all WSXJS packages using Turbo and Changesets.

guide/advanced/i18next-integration.title: @wsxjs/wsx-i18next Usage Guide
guide/advanced/i18next-integration.description: @wsxjs/wsx-i18next provides i18next internationalization support for WSXJS components, making it easy for your application to support multiple languages

guide/advanced/example-development-plan.title: Example Component Development Plan
guide/advanced/example-development-plan.description: Fully demonstrate WSXJS capabilities through rich example components, providing developers with best practice references

guide/advanced/dom-cache.title: DOM Cache and Key Best Practices
guide/advanced/dom-cache.description: WSXJS uses DOM caching mechanism to optimize rendering performance and avoid unnecessary DOM element reconstruction
